Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.dao

Class AbstractDao<T extends Idable>

java.lang.Object
ba.unsa.etf.rpr.dao.AbstractDao<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dao<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReservationsDaoSQLImpl, RoomDaoSQLImpl, UserDaoSQLImpl
public abstract class AbstractDao<T extends Idable> extends Object implements Dao<T>
Abstract class that implements core DAO CRUD methods for every entity
